entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023
